alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:45PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...STRONG WIND GUSTS WILL IMPACT CHEROKEE COUNTY THROUGH 115 PM CST... At 1243 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy rain extending from near Little River Canyon National Preserve to Hokes Bluff. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Centre, Cedar Bluff, Little River Canyon National Preserve, Forney, Centre Municipal Airport, Leesburg, Sand Rock, Gaylesville, Tennala, Cherokee Rock Village, Pleasant Gap, Cornwall Furnace Park, Blanche, Eastern Weiss Lake, Little River Falls, Slackland, Western Weiss Lake, Moshat, Ball Flat, and Coloma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
